content.raw:
The 2.3.0 release was tagged from the default branch, not the `ign-math2` branch:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/commits/6e625a118d4525b0c88b6d57dfdd50cf76512656?at=ignition-math2_2.3.0

There are some things on default that aren't on `ign-math2` (though some of them probably should have been on `ign-math2`):

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branches/compare/ignition-math2_2.3.0%0Dign-math2#pull-requests

This means that we will have a problem if we tag the next release from `ign-math2` ([ABI checker](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/ignition_math-abichecker-any_to_any-vivid-amd64/17/)).
